about.title: Renk
about.description: art-rock band pushing the boundaries of music
about.extendedDescription:
Renk is an art-rock band whose songs are a blend of melancholic and aggressive compositions with psychedelic elements. With an emphasis on visual experience as much as the musical, Renk strives to transmit emotions in every medium available.


The band's first single 'Sonsuz Karmaşa' was released in 2016. The same year, the band made its international debut in Gdansk, Poland after touring the metropolitan cities of Turkey including Ankara, Istanbul, Eskişehir and Antalya.


Their latest release, 'Kıyı', shines as one of rare concept albums released in recent years. From hopeful melodies and dark ambient drones to uplifting progressive narratives and existential lyrics, Renk tells a 60 minutes long story of unhomeliness and estrangement with the world.


Band Members:

Anıl Kahvecioğlu - Vocals and Guitars
Gökhan Şensönmez - Guitars
Kemal Türkeri - Bass Guitars
Ekin Özek - Saxophone & Keys
Eren Özgün - Drums

news.title: News
news.subtitle: Latest developments and announcements from Renk

items.title: Our Acoustic Concert at Kült Kavaklıdere!
items.description: After a long period of work, our new album 'Renkler' has taken its place on all digital platforms. In this 10-track album, we have further developed our unique Renk sound by blending different music genres.

items.title: Istanbul Concert Received Great Interest
items.description: Our concert in Istanbul brought together thousands of music lovers. We had an unforgettable night and thank all participants.

items.title: Ankara and Izmir Concerts Announced
items.description: We will meet with our fans in Ankara and Izmir in September. Tickets will be on sale very soon, stay tuned!
